channel.title: Matrix on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Matrix on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 3285 Find Indices of Stable Mountains
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3285 Question There are n mountains in a row, and each mountain has a height.

item.title: Problem 2326 Spiral Matrix IV
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2326 Question You are given two integers m and n, which represent the dimensions of a matrix.

item.title: Problem 2022 Convert 1D Array to 2D Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2022 Question You are given a 0-indexed 1-dimensional (1D) integer array original, and two integers, m and n.

item.title: Problem 3238 Find the Number of Winning Players
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3238 Question You are given an integer n representing the number of players in a game and a 2D array pick where pick[i] = [xi, yi] represents that the player xi picked a ball of color yi.

item.title: Problem 54 Sprial Matrix
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 54 Question Given an m x n matrix, return all elements of the matrix in spiral order.

item.title: Problem 832 Flipping an Image
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 832 Question Given an n x n binary matrix image, flip the image horizontally, then invert it, and return the resulting image.

item.title: Problem 1605 Find Valid Matrix Given Row and Column Sums
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1605 Question You are given two arrays rowSum and colSum of non-negative integers where rowSum[i] is the sum of the elements in the ith row and colSum[j] is the sum of the elements of the jth column of a 2D matrix.

item.title: Problem 1380 Lucky Number in a Matrix
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1380 Question Given an m x n matrix of distinct numbers, return all lucky numbers in the matrix in any order.

item.title: Problem 1219 Path With Maximum Gold
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1219 Question In a gold mine grid of size m x n, each cell in this mine has an integer representing the amount of gold in that cell, 0 if it is empty.

item.title: Problem 861 Score After Flipping Matrix
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 861 Question You are given an m x n binary matrix grid.

item.title: Problem 2373 Largest Local Values in a Matrix
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2373 Question You are given an n x n integer matrix grid.

item.title: Problem 1289 Minimum Falling Path Sum II
item.description: Problem Statement Link: Problem 1289 Question Given an n x n integer matrix grid, return the minimum sum of a falling path with non-zero shifts.

item.title: Problem 1992 Find All Groups of Farmland
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1992 Question You are given a 0-indexed m x n binary matrix land where a 0 represents a hectare of forested land and a 1 represents a hectare of farmland.

item.title: Problem 200 Number of Islands
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 200 Question Given an m x n 2D binary grid grid which represents a map of '1's (land) and '0's (water), return the number of islands.

item.title: Problem 463 Island Perimeter
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 463 Question You are given row x col grid representing a map where grid[i][j] = 1 represents land and grid[i][j] = 0 represents water.
